page.title: 11Rothbury Carnival
page.content: This has been the first year without Rothbury Carnival. It was normally held on an area of land called the "Haugh" but this site was not available last year so the organisers moved the event to Pauperhaugh, not far from here. The last carnival in Rothbury was in the high street. There were a lot of stalls including a coconut shy and near the end of the day they sold off at a cheap rate any coconuts they thought were bad. There was also a Highland Pipe Band and if you asked the drummers nicely they would let you bang the drums. There was also a beer tent at the carnival and some people who had taken too much to drink ended up in the river, especially if it was a sunny day.
